articles.title: Microsoft just claimed a quantum breakthrough. A quantum physicist explains what it means - The Conversation
articles.description: A new “topological” approach to quantum computing may address longstanding challenges with the technology.
articles.content: Researchers at Microsoft have announced the creation of the first topological qubits in a device that stores information in an exotic state of matter, in what may be a significant breakthrough for qu… [+4894 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google pulls Gemini from main search app on iOS - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is pulling its Gemini assistant from the main Google app on iOS, in a bid to encourage users to download the dedicated Gemini app.
articles.content: Google is pulling its AI assistant Gemini from the main Google app for iOS devices. The move is meant to encourage users to download the standalone Gemini app instead, which would allow Google to mor… [+1887 chars]
